DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , stratify , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multi-center study follow active-treatment phase . To evaluate effect AMG 334 compare placebo change baseline monthly migraine day .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety AMG 334 Migraine Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , stratify , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multi-center study follow active-treatment phase . Adults one-year history episodic migraine currently , previously never receive migraine prophylactic medication randomize one two AMG 334 treatment group placebo treatment group double blind treatment phase . During active treatment phase , subject randomize one two AMG 334 treatment group .
DOC.criteria: History migraine ( without aura ) ≥ 12 month prior screen accord IHS Classification ICHD3 ( Headache Classification Committee International Headache Society , 2013 ) Migraine frequency : ≥ 4 < 15 migraine day per month average across 3 month prior screen baseline Headache frequency : < 15 headache day per month average across 3 month prior screen baseline Demonstrated least 80 % compliance eDiary . Older 50 year age migraine onset History cluster headache hemiplegic migraine headache Unable differentiate migraine headache No therapeutic response > 2 medication category prophylactic treatment migraine adequate therapeutic trial Used prohibit medication , device , procedure within 2 month prior start baseline phase baseline phase Concomitant use 2 medication possible migraine prophylactic effect within 2 month prior start baseline phase baseline phase . If 1 prophylactic medication use , dose must stable within 2 month prior start baseline phase throughout study
